channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: ピッツバーグの新聞社社員が、ブロック・コミュニケーションズ傘下のピッツバーグ・ポスト・ガゼット紙とのストライキ1周年を記念して集会を開いた（Tori Yorgey/WTAE）
item.description:
Tori Yorgey / WTAE:
Pittsburgh newspaper employees rally to mark the one-year anniversary of their ongoing strike against Block Communications' Pittsburgh Post-Gazette  —  Rally to be held Friday afternoon  —  Friday marked one year since workers at the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette walked out of their workplace and onto the picket line.

item.title: ネバダ州最高裁は、殺害されたジェフ・ジャーマン記者の端末を警察の捜査から保護し、第三者が彼の報道資料を捜査するよう求めた（Katelyn Newberg/Las Vegas Review-Journal）
item.description:
Katelyn Newberg / Las Vegas Review-Journal:
The Nevada Supreme Court protects murdered reporter Jeff German's devices from police searches, calling for a third party to search his journalistic materials  —  The Nevada Supreme Court has moved to protect slain Las Vegas Review-Journal investigative reporter Jeff German's personal devices …

item.title: カナダの遺産相、オンラインニュース法へのハイテク企業の反対にもかかわらず「引き下がらない」と発言、グーグルは規則案は懸念に対処していないと述べる（フランス通信社）
item.description:
Agence France-Presse:
Canada's heritage minister says the country “will not back down” despite tech opposition to the Online News Act; Google says draft rules don't address concerns  —  Canada “will not back down” in the face of opposition from tech giants to a new law requiring companies like Google …

item.title: 超法規的殺人の擁護など、ますます攻撃的になるトランプの言葉はほとんど注目されず、メディアはまだ彼をどう取り上げるべきかわかっていないことを示唆している（Paul Farhi/Washington Post）。
item.description:
Paul Farhi / Washington Post:
Trump's increasingly aggressive words, including advocacy of extrajudicial killings, get little attention, suggesting media still doesn't know how to cover him  —  After eight years of Trump in politics, is a ‘banality of crazy’ setting in?  —  Last week, the Republican Party's leading …

item.title: ニューズクリック記者逮捕後、18のメディア団体がインド最高裁長官に言論の自由を擁護し、報道機関のメディア脅迫に介入するよう要請（The Wire）
item.description:
The Wire:
After arrests of NewsClick journalists, 18 media groups urge India's chief justice to uphold free speech and intervene against agencies' intimidation of media  —  'The developments over the past 24 hours have left us no option but to appeal to your good conscience to take cognisance and intervene …

item.title: 米国のヒスパニック系／ラテン系成人2,637人を対象とした調査：2023年には過去最高の38％が毎月ポッドキャストを聴くようになる。
item.description:
Edison Research:
Survey of 2,637 US Hispanic/Latino adults: a record 38% are monthly podcast listeners in 2023, up from 25% in 2020, rising nearly 4X faster than all US adults  —  Latino Podcast Listeners Engage with Ads as Listening Grows … Monthly podcast listenership among Latinos increased by 52% since 2020 …

item.title: Xは、報告やブロックができず、広告ラベルやユーザー・プロファイルがなく、広告主を開示しない新しいモバイル広告フォーマットを展開しているようだ（Matt Binder/Mashable）
item.description:
Matt Binder / Mashable:
X appears to be rolling out a new mobile ad format that can't be reported or blocked, lacks an ad label and user profile, and doesn't disclose the advertiser  —  The new ads also don't disclose who the advertiser is or that they are even ads.  —  X, the Elon Musk-owned platform formerly known as Twitter …

item.title: ヒプグノシス・ソングス・ファンドの子会社ヒプグノシス・ソングス・グループが、元同僚から2005年に性的暴行を受けたとされるケニー・マクファーソンCEOを休職処分に (Ethan Millman/Rolling Stone)
item.description:
Ethan Millman / Rolling Stone:
Hipgnosis Songs Fund subsidiary Hipgnosis Songs Group places CEO Kenny MacPherson on leave after a former colleague alleges he sexually assaulted her in 2005  —  MacPherson was accused of sexually assaulting a colleague 15 years ago while he was the president of the music publishing company Chrysalis

item.title: 情報筋：Hipgnosis Songs Fund の主要株主は、Blackstone の私募ファンドへの4億4000万ドルの音楽著作権売却を阻止することを目指している。
item.description:
Financial Times:
Sources: major Hipgnosis Songs Fund shareholders aim to block a $440M music rights sale to a private Blackstone fund, a source says because the price is too low  —  Some investors believe the sale of music rights to a private sister fund owned by Blackstone undervalues the assets

item.title: 米労働統計局：映画・録音業界は2023年5月以降、4万5,000人分の雇用を失い、うち7,000人分は9月だけ（Kayla Cobb/The Wrap）
item.description:
Kayla Cobb / The Wrap:
The US Bureau of Labor Statistics: the motion picture and sound recording industries lost 45,000 jobs since May 2023, including 7,000 jobs just in September  —  The film and TV sector lost 7,000 jobs in September alone  —  A September report from the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics has found …

item.title: 情報源キャンドル・メディア、2023年の利益は予想3億3000万ドルに対し1億4000万～1億7000万ドルと予想、買収が失敗：ハロー・サンシャインから1000万ドル以下、ムーンバグから1億5000万ドル以下（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
Sources: Candle Media expects 2023 profit of $140M-$170M, vs. $330M est., as acquisitions fall short: less than $10M from Hello Sunshine and ~$150M from Moonbug  —  - Former Disney executives spent freely at top of the market  — Hollywood strikes, industry cutbacks have crimped profits

item.title: The Athletic』は数週間前に多くのローカルポッドキャストをキャンセルし、あるいは数カ月間休止させたままにしており、ライターたちには別の場所で再スタートしてマネタイズできるよう伝えている（Sarah Scire/Nieman Lab）。
item.description:
Sarah Scire / Nieman Lab:
The Athletic canceled many local podcasts a few weeks ago or has left them dormant for months, telling its writers they can relaunch and monetize them elsewhere  —  The sports news site built its model around comprehensive beat reporting.  But in recent months, The Athletic has pulled …

item.title: 情報筋News Corpは、2022年に$70M+を投資したオーストラリアのギャンブル新興企業Betr株を2023年2月に静かに売却したが、Betrの広告掲載は継続する（Australian Financial Review）。
item.description:
Australian Financial Review:
Sources: News Corp quietly sold its Australian gambling startup Betr shares in February 2023, after investing $70M+ in 2022, but will continue carrying Betr ads  —  News Corp quietly sold its shares in Betr, the wagering start-up run by wealthy bookmaker Matthew Tripp, just four months …

item.title: テイラー・スウィフトやビヨンセのコンサート映画が、ハリウッドのストライキで空洞化した冬の映画館を大いに盛り上げている。
item.description:
Financial Times:
Concert films by Taylor Swift and Beyoncé are providing a much-needed boost for cinemas facing a sparse winter film slate hollowed out by the Hollywood strikes  —  Movies of two blockbuster tours provide a much-needed boost in a difficult year of Hollywood strikes

item.title: ゲッティ イメージズのクレイグ・ピーターズ氏とのQ&A：同社のジェネレーティブAIツール、著作権問題、権利者の帰属、ディープフェイク、偽情報などについて（Nilay Patel/The Verge）
item.description:
Nilay Patel / The Verge:
Q&A with Getty Images' Craig Peters on the company's generative AI tool, copyright issues, attribution for rights holders, deepfakes, disinformation, and more  —  Getty's entire brand is built on authenticity.  CEO Craig Peters sat down with us at Code to talk about how the company is dealing with AI and disinformation.
